participant_1.background:
My family loves food of all types, and we are always looking for new places to try.
my mother is a ballerina.
I was a model for a few years before I decided to dedicate my life to protecting the environment.
i have been in 3 triathlons.
my mother is from greece.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, but I've lived all over the country.
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
i am a poet.
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
I value the time I have with my family and pets the most.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a model and artist, what about you?
Hi there! I'm a museum curator and poet, nice to meet you!
Wow, that's so cool! What kind of museum do you curate?
I curate a museum of art and history, it's really interesting.
That sounds like a really fun job, I'm sure it's rewarding!
It really is, I love learning about art and history and sharing that with others.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! Where are you from originally?
I'm from the Midwest, but I've lived all over the country.
Oh, cool! I've lived all over the country too, it's fun to experience different places.
Yeah, it really is! What's your favorite place you've lived so far?
I really like New York City, it's so vibrant and exciting.
New York City is definitely a fun place to live, I've been there a few times and I always have a great time.
Yeah, it's a great place to visit too!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, go to museums, and spend time with my family and pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read, write, and go to museums too.
Oh, cool! We should go to a museum together sometime.
